content:
y complex cilium cannot
have functional precursors, it cannot be produced by natural selection,
which  requires  a  continuum  of  function  to  work.  Natural  selection  is
powerless when there is no function to select. We can go further and say
that, if the cilium cannot be produced by natural selection, then the cilium
was designed.
A Non-Mechanical Example
A non-mechanical example of irreducible complexity can be seen in the sys-
tem that targets proteins for delivery to subcellular compart
